TopicTitle: Dres Awareness, Show Your Support! (still not-dead :))

Articles.Content:
7 hours ago, max_creative said:

I still think dres is overrated but because I haven't gone to my favorite, Moho, yet (or any other planets or even minmus or landing on the mun) I will shoot for the moon the overrated space potato and try and give it some love.  I will tell you when I spontaneously combust my dres rocket on the pad complete this challenge!

This isn't a place to badmouth Dres and say others are better. This is a place of calm, and apreciation for our lonely space potato.

8 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

This isn't a place to badmouth Dres and say others are better. This is a place of calm, and apreciation for our lonely space potato.

If KSP gives you a lonely space potato, make lonely space potato french fries!

22 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:This isn't a place to badmouth Dres and say others are better. This is a place of calm, and apreciation for our lonely space potato.

Ok I will send a rocket to dres with a rover+skycrane and give it some love in the canyon (if it even takes off)

to do list:

1 send 500 tons of dres awerness stuff (canyon jumping, rovers, satellites, landers, and more)

2 land on the mun

3 throw stuff in to the mohole

Is 500 tons of dres stuff good? (And after this, later 2 more missions)

dres FTW!!! Go space potatoes!

Also, found this on the ksp wiki:

Spoiler

Trivia
Dres is often disregarded and ignored among the KSP community.
YouTube user Felsmark created a video claiming that Dres is nothing but a hoax created by the Kerbal government in an attempt to add interest to the fabled planet Harvest.
Several forum users have created a group to raise awareness and show support to Dres, in the form of giant missions to the dwarf planet.
Dres was the first celestial body chosen to be the host planet of a moon for the Kopernicus Creativity Marathon.
Dres is the only other celestial body, other than Ike and Kerbin, whose terrain has been changed in only one Kopernicus planet pack. All the other planets have been edited in multiple mods like Uncharted Lands and Alternis Kerbol.
Dres is the celestial body most similar to Duna. Both have whiter areas near the poles, names that start with "D", similar orbits, low amounts of craters, and canyons that can be seen from the Map View.

  Hide contents

Trivia
Dres is often disregarded and ignored among the KSP community.
YouTube user Felsmark created a video claiming that Dres is nothing but a hoax created by the Kerbal government in an attempt to add interest to the fabled planet Harvest.
Several forum users have created a group to raise awareness and show support to Dres, in the form of giant missions to the dwarf planet.
Dres was the first celestial body chosen to be the host planet of a moon for the Kopernicus Creativity Marathon.
Dres is the only other celestial body, other than Ike and Kerbin, whose terrain has been changed in only one Kopernicus planet pack. All the other planets have been edited in multiple mods like Uncharted Lands and Alternis Kerbol.
Dres is the celestial body most similar to Duna. Both have whiter areas near the poles, names that start with "D", similar orbits, low amounts of craters, and canyons that can be seen from the Map View.
 

 


 

 

Duna us Dres's older brother obviously.
Also spaceplane, I think I've figured out what you favorite planet is... Let me guess, dres?

12 minutes ago, max_creative said:

Also spaceplane, I think I've figured out what you favorite planet is... Let me guess, dres?

Yes yes.... max_creative, I love your enthusiasm, but please refrain from multiple posts about nearly the same thing within a very short time frame. Thanks!

39 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

Yes yes.... max_creative, I love your enthusiasm, but please refrain from multiple posts about nearly the same thing within a very short time frame. Thanks!

Ok. BTW stand by for dres 1 launch T- 10... 9... 8...

I could send one of my suicidal Macrocarriers to Dres, the only problem is they tend to tear themselves apart whenever I switch to them. I'll try and make a canyon base with them. Is it okay if I use mods? If not, I'll have to come up with something else

Once, I wanted to send a plane to Dres and back, it was a VTOL, but I got bored of trying to set up maneuver nodes so I went to Eve instead. Bad idea.

Dres one, which is eight landers is waiting in orbit. Dres two, which is a station blew up the pad (the whole rocket only weighs 1278 tons) then crashed our computer... Maybe I should only send dres 1, 3, and 4? Dres three is a base and four is a manned lander and return vehicle (like a Saturn V except for dres)

Tomorrow putting...

... Pod racers for dres canyon

... Fun stuff for Moho

...Kerbal friends for eeloo

to prepare for transfer windows (don't ask why pod racers, just deal with it )

edit: also, I can't take screenshots until we get a new keyboard and mouse because our current ones cannot f12 with out just turning up the sound, and can't right click. Doing stuff with action groups is so hard! 

Edited March 19, 2016 by max_creative
It say right there

Ok I know I am kinda over posting, but update:

Dres One in parking orbit.

Dres Two in parking orbit.

Dres Three on stand by.

Dres Four being assembled.

Dres CTV (crew transfer vehicle) on stand by.

Also this guy is pure evil! He says everything is better than Dres. He mentioned Moho and Eeloo, but he is evil. Show love not hate! LOVE DRES!

 

everyone hate on this guy! BOO!!!

That's the opposite of what we Dres lovers want!
